tool_description: Analyzes and processes search queries to extract intent, entities, and structured information for improved ranking.

user_id.description: Identifier for the user making the search

error_messages: Empty query: Provide a non-empty search query string.
Query too long: Query must be under 500 characters.
Processing failed: Unable to analyze query due to system error.
usage: Pass the search query string and optionally user_id to get structured analysis including intent, entities, and query type classification.

processed_query.description: Cleaned and normalized version of the input query

extracted_entities.description: List of entities extracted from the query

query_type.description: Classification of query type (product, brand, category, etc.)
